Text: The Mountbatten family is a European dynasty originating as a branch of the German princely Battenberg family.
Triplets:<The Mountbatten family
1:
3. Text: Mountbatten family:  The name was adopted during World War I by family members residing in the United Kingdom due to rising anti-German sentiment amongst the British public.

Triplet: <Mountbatten family

Text: Mountbatten family:  The name is an Anglicisation of the German Battenberg, a small town in Hesse.
